gurmukhi: ਅਸੁਰਿ ਬਿਹੰਡਣਿ ਦੁਸਟ ਨਿਕੰਦਣਿ ਪੁਸਟ ੳੁਦੰਡਣਿ ਰੂਪ ਅਤੇ ||
transliteration: Asur(i) Bihanndan(i) Doust Nikandan(i) Poust Udanndan(i) Roop Ate||
translation: O Supremely beautiful goddess! The slayer of demons, destroyer of tyrants and chastiser of the mighty.

gurmukhi: ਚੰਡਾਸੁਰ ਚੰਡਣਿ ਮੁੰਡ ਬਿਹੰਡਣਿ ਧੂਮ੍ਰ ਬਿਪੁੰਸਣਿ ਮਹਿਖ ਮਤੇ ||
transliteration: Channddaasur Channddan(i) Mounnd Bihanndan(i) Dhoomra Bidhounsan(i) Mahikh Mate||
translation: Punisher of the demon Chand, Slayer of the demon Mund, the killer of Dhumar Lochan and trampler of Mahishasura.

gurmukhi: ਦਾਨਵੀਂ ਪ੍ਹਾਰਣਿ ਨਰਕ ਨਿਵਾਰਣਿ ਅਧਿਮ ੳੁਧਾਰਣਿ ੳੁਰਧ ਅਧੇ ||
transliteration: Daanvoon Prahaaran(i) Narak Nivaaran(i) Adhim Udhaaran(i) Uradh Adhe||
translation: Destroyer of demons, Saviour from hell, and liberator of the sinners of upper and nether regions.

gurmukhi: ਜੈ ਜੈ ਹੋਸੀ ਮਹਿਖਾਸੁਰ ਮਰਦਨ ਰੰਮ ਕਪਰਦਨ ਅਾਦਿ ਬ੍ਰਿਤੇ ||੨||੨੧੨||
transliteration: Jai Jai Hosoo Mahikhaasur Mardan Ranm Kapardan Aadh Brite||2||212||
translation: Hail, hail, O Slayer of Mahishasura, the Primal Power with elegant knot of long hair on thy head. 2.212.

gurmukhi: ਡਾਵਰੂ ਡਵੰਕੈ ਬਬਰ ਬਵੰਕੈ ਭੁਜਾ ਫਰੰਕੈ ਤੇਜ ਬਰੰ ||
transliteration: Daadaroo Davankai Babar Bavankai Bhujaa Pharankai Tej Baran||
translation: Thy tabor is played in the battlefield and Thy lion roars and with Thy strength and glory, Thy arms quiver.

gurmukhi: ਲੰਕੁੜੀਅਾ ਫਾਧੈ ਅਾਯੁਧ ਬਾਂਧੈ ਸੈਨ ਬਿਮਰਦਨ ਕਾਲ ਅਸੁਰੰ ||
transliteration: Lankoundeeaa Phaadhai Aayudh Baandhai Sain Bimardan Kaal Asuran||
translation: Furnished with armour, Thy soldiers take strides over the field, Thou art the slayer of armies and the death of the demons.

gurmukhi: ਅਸਟਾਯੁਧ ਚਮਕੈ ਭੂਖਣ ਦਮਕੈ ਅਤਿਸਿਤ ਝਮਕੈ ਫੁੰਕ ਫਣੰ ||
transliteration: Astaayudh Chamkai Bhookhan Damkai Atisit Jhamkai Phounk Phanan||
translation: The eight weapons glisten in Thy hands like ornaments; Thou art gleaming like lighting and hissing like snakes.

gurmukhi: ਜੈ ਜੈ ਹੋਸੀ ਮਹਿਖਾਸੁਰ ਮਰਦਨ ਰੰਮ ਕਪਰਦਨ ਦੈਤ ਜਿਣੰ ||੩||੨੧੩||
transliteration: Jai Jai Hosoo Mahikhaasur Mardan Ranm Kapardan Dait Jinan||3||213||
translation: Hail, hail, O slayer of Mahishasura, O Conqueror of demons with elegant knot of long hair on Thy head.3.213.

gurmukhi: ਚੰਡਾਸੁਰ ਚੰਡਣ ਮੁੰਡ ਬਿਮੁੰਡਣ ਖੰਡ ਅਖੰਡਣ ਖੂਨ ਖਿਤ ||
transliteration: Channddaasur Channdan Mounnd Bimounndan Khanndakhannddan Khoon Khite||
translation: Punisher of the demon Chand, Slayer of the deomon Mund and, Breaker into pieces of the Unbreakable in the battlefield.

gurmukhi: ਦਾਮਨੀ ਦਮੰਕਣਿ ਧੁਜਾ ਫਰੰਕਣਿ ਫਣੀ ਫੁਕਾਰਣਿ ਜੋਧ ਜਿਤੇ ||
transliteration: Daamanndo Damanndan(i) Dhujaa Pharankan(i) Phanoo Phoukaaran(i) Jodh Jite||
translation: O Goddess! Thou flashest like lightning, Thy flags oscillate, Thy serpents hiss, O Conqueror of the warriors.

gurmukhi: ਸਰ ਧਾਰ ਬਿਬਰਖਣਿ ਦੁਸਟ ਪ੍ਰਕਰਖਣਿ ਪੁਸਟ ਪ੍ਹਰਖਣਿ ਦੁਸ਼ਟ ਮਥੇ ||
transliteration: Sar Dhaar Bibarkhan(i) Doust Prakarkhan(i) Poust Praharkhan(i) Dousht Mathe||
translation: Thou causest the rain of the arrows and makest the tyrants trampled in the battlefield; Thou givest great delight to the Yoginin ‘pusit’, who drank the blood of Raktavija demon and destroyest the scoundrels.

gurmukhi: ਜੈ ਜੈ ਹੋਸੀ ਮਹਿਖਾਸੁਰ ਮਰਦਨ ਭੂਮ ਅਕਾਸ ਤਲ ੳੁਰਧ ਅਧੇ ||੪||੨੧੪||
transliteration: Jai Jai Hosoo Mahikhaasur Mardan Bhoom Akaas Tal Urdh Adhe||4||214||
translation: Hail, hail, O slayer of Mahishasura, pervading the earth, sky and nether-worlds, both above and below.4.214.

gurmukhi: ਦਾਮਨੀ ਪ੍ਹਾਸਨਿ ਸੁ ਛਬਿ ਨਿਵਾਸਨਿ ਸ੍ਰਿਸਟਿ ਪ੍ਰਕਾਸਨਿ ਗੂੜ੍ਹ ਗਤੇ ||
transliteration: Daamanndo Prahaasan(i) Su Chhab(i) Nivaasan(i) Sristtee Prakaasan(i) Goodh Gade||
translation: Thou laughest like the flash of lightining, Thou abidest in winsome elegance, Thou givest birth to the world.

gurmukhi: ਰਕਤਾਸੁਰ ਅਾਚਨ ਜੁਧ ਪ੍ਰਮਾਚਨ ਨ੍ਰਿਦੈ ਨਰਾਚਨ ਧਰਮ ਬ੍ਰਿਤੇ ||
translation: O Deity of profound principles, O Pious-natured Goddess, Thou art the devourer of the demon Raktavija, enhancer of the zeal for warfare and fearless dancer.
